columns.text: In this problem, we need to determine the  average accounts receivable.

First, a company’s receivables is  equal to its average daily sales multiplied by its  average collection period. So, to calculate average accounts receivable, use the folloving formula:
$$\begin{align*}
\text{Accounts receivable}&=\text{Average daily sales}\cdot \text{Average collection period}\\
\end{align*}$$

Company Skye Flyer, Inc. has weekly credit sales in the amount of $\$21,900$, and  average collection period is $33$ days. 

Substituting the given data in the formula from step 2, we have


$$\begin{align*}
\text{Accounts receivable}&=\text{Average daily sales}\cdot \text{Average collection period}\\[15pt]
&=\frac{\$21,900}{7}\cdot 33\\[15pt]

&=\$3,128.57\cdot 33\\[15pt]
&=\$103,242.86\\[15pt]
\end{align*}$$

**Hence, the company’s average accounts receivable is equal to $103,242.86.**
In this problem, we have to ascertain the average accounts receivable figure.

When the payment is deferred to some other date for the product or service delivered today, it means the producer or service provider has provided **credit**. Once the credit is provided a **receivable is created**. These in the accounting parlance are known as **account receivable**.

The **Average Account Receivable** is calculated by using the following formula:

$$\text{Account Receivable= Average Daily sales $\times$ Average Collection Period}$$

It must be noted that the **average collection period or $\textbf{ACP}$** is the period in which the payment is received.

Let us first note down the provided information:


|**Particulars** | **Value**| 
|--|--| 
|Weekly Credit Sales | \$21,900| 
|ACP | 33 days|

Now we will calculate the average account receivables:



$$\begin{aligned}
\text{Account Receivable}&=\frac{\$21,900}{7} \times33\\\\
&\approx\$103,242.86
\end{aligned}$$

Thus the average account receivables amount to $\$103,242.86$
Therefore, the **average account receivable** figure when the weekly credit sales are $\$21,900$ and the ACP is $33$ days is $\$103,242.86$.
